wsdl:definitions.name: udi
wsdl:definitions.wsdl:documentation: Web Services Flag, Objects, Parameters, Messages, and Bindings for ISY

xsd:annotation.xsd:documentation: Optionally, provide the type of node to be discovered
Provide the command to be processed in the SecAction tag for example, see ELKActionCodes Provide the security code in the code tag
1 : Do not return an error if not currently subscribed
the amount of time the device should be on/off.
Parameter for retrieving all variables of a certain type
Parameter for retrieving the value of a specific variable
Parameter for setting a variable to the desired value
Timestamp in the form of YYYYMMDD HH:MM:SS
Return value of type integer. Currently used for IsSubscribed

wsdl:operation.name: GetISYConfig
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns the current configuration of ISY

wsdl:operation.name: GetNodesConfig
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns the configuration of nodes, groups, scenes, and any relationship thereto

wsdl:operation.name: AddGroup
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Adds a scene/group

wsdl:operation.name: RemoveGroup
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Removes a group (permanently) from configuration

wsdl:operation.name: RenameGroup
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Renames a group in configuration

wsdl:operation.name: AddFolder
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Adds a folder

wsdl:operation.name: RemoveFolder
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Removes a folder (permanently) from configuration

wsdl:operation.name: RenameFolder
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Renames a folder in configuration

wsdl:operation.name: AddNode
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Adds a predefined node for a device with a given address

wsdl:operation.name: RemoveNode
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Removes a node (permanently) from configuration

wsdl:operation.name: RenameNode
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Renames a node in configuration

wsdl:operation.name: MoveNode
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Moves a node into a group/scene

wsdl:operation.name: RemoveFromGroup
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Removes a Node from a Group

wsdl:operation.name: RenameNetwork
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Renames the Network name

wsdl:operation.name: Query
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Queries a node, a scene, or even the whole network

wsdl:operation.name: SetLinkingMode
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Changes the way ISY discovers nodes/devices ISY as a controller or ISY as a responder

wsdl:operation.name: StartNodesDiscovery
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Puts ISY in discovery (linking) mode Optionally, provide the type of device to look for

wsdl:operation.name: StopNodesDiscovery
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: The flag decides the operations (reset, crawl, spider) to be performed after device(s) are discovered

wsdl:operation.name: InternetAccess
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Enables/Disables port forwarding to ISY on UPnP enabled routers. This process might take a long time and, as such, one must take caution with TCP connect timeouts

wsdl:operation.name: GetSystemStatus
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns the current state of ISY

wsdl:operation.name: GetSystemDateTime
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns the current state of ISY

wsdl:operation.name: SetSystemDateTime
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns the current state of ISY

wsdl:operation.name: GetSystemOptions
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns the options by which ISY is configured

wsdl:operation.name: GetSMTPConfig
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns the SMTP Options configured in ISY

wsdl:operation.name: SetSMTPConfig
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Sets SMTP Configuration Parameters

wsdl:operation.name: SetNotificationsOptions
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Sets Notifications Options

wsdl:operation.name: SetProgramOptions
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Sets Program Options

wsdl:operation.name: SetNTPOptions
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Sets NTP Options

wsdl:operation.name: SynchWithNTS
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Adjusts the clock to NTS

wsdl:operation.name: Reboot
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Reboots the system

wsdl:operation.name: SetUserCredentials
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Changes the userid and password for a user

wsdl:operation.name: RestoreDevices
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Restores devices from the configuration in ISY

wsdl:operation.name: RestoreDevice
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Restores a specific device from the configuration in ISY

wsdl:operation.name: ReplaceModem
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Replaces the modem attached to ISY and reconfigures devices if necessary

wsdl:operation.name: RemoveModem
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Replaces the modem attached to ISY and reconfigures devices if necessary

wsdl:operation.name: ReplaceDevice
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Replaces one device with another (swap)

wsdl:operation.name: SecuritySystemAction
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Arm/disarm a security system

wsdl:operation.name: GetDebugLevel
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets the debug options and current level

wsdl:operation.name: SetDebugLevel
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets the debug options and current level

wsdl:operation.name: GetSceneProfiles
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: In case this is a controller for a scene, set the node element to the controller's address

wsdl:operation.name: SetSceneProfile
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: In case this is a controller for a scene, set the node element to the responder's address

wsdl:operation.name: Subscribe
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: duration: use infinite

wsdl:operation.name: Unsubscribe
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Unsubscribe from ISY

wsdl:operation.name: IsSubscribed
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: 1 - Subscribed

wsdl:operation.name: GetCurrentSystemStatus
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Sends the current system status (whole) to the given subscriber

wsdl:operation.name: SendTestEmail
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Sends a test email. This is used to check SMTP settings.

wsdl:operation.name: ClearLastError
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Clears the list of recent errors in ISY

wsdl:operation.name: GetLastError
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets the list of recent errors in ISY

wsdl:operation.name: SetNodeEnabled
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Enables or disables a node

wsdl:operation.name: SetParent
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Sets a parent for a node

wsdl:operation.name: IsDDNSHostAvail
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Whether or not a DDNS Host is available

wsdl:operation.name: GetDDNSHost
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns the currently configured DDNS host

wsdl:operation.name: AddDDNSHost
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Registers and DDNS host with the associated IP

wsdl:operation.name: RemoveDDNSHost
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Removes the registered DDNS host. Must use GetDDNSHost

wsdl:operation.name: WriteDeviceUpdates
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Causes device updates to be written to the given node

wsdl:operation.name: SetBatchMode
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Causes the system to go to/exit batch mode

wsdl:operation.name: SetBatteryDeviceWriteMode
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Enables/disables writing to battery devices automatically

wsdl:operation.name: SetNodePowerInfo
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Sets the Power characteristics for a node

wsdl:operation.name: GetStartupTime
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns a timestamp of when ISY was last started

wsdl:operation.name: SendHeartbeat
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Immediately sends a heartbeat message to all subscribers

wsdl:operation.name: SetVariable
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Sets a variable to the desired value

wsdl:operation.name: GetVariable
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a variable

wsdl:operation.name: GetVariables
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves all variables of a certain type

wsdl:binding.name: UDIServices_Binding
wsdl:binding.wsdl:documentation: UDI Binding binds the concrete Port (UDI Services) to the Abstract Port Type (UDIServices_PortType)
